name: Flee the Fortress
description:
Mini and Miney are two golems with a heart for adventure. Suddenly being trapped in a temple fortress on one of their journeys, they must make a run to the escape, and that part of the story is all in your hands.

Tutorial is meant to be easy, the spikes DO NOT work.

Game Dev by: Decacentum

Music by: ;Jordan;

Made for Mini Jam 59: Fortress. Controls Ingame.
